original: @44b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: 'dod pa'i don nges par bsgrub par 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par mandal ser po yid du 'ong ba'i steng du me tog ser po dri ma med pa bkram ste /

original: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje gtum po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas bdag gam gzhan bsgrub bya'i lus thams cad rdo rje rtse gsum par byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje gtum po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas bdag gam gzhan bsgrub bya'i lus thams cad rdo rje rtse gsum par byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Then, with the pride of being Vajra Acala, bless the entire body of oneself or another, the one to be liberated, as a three-pointed vajra.

original: pha rol gyi lus la gnod par rung ba gang yin pa rnams bcing ba dang bkar ba dang / spa bkong ba'i las nye bar bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: pha rol gyi lus la gnod par rung ba gang yin pa rnams bcing ba dang bkar ba dang / spa bkong ba'i las nye bar bsgrub par bya ste /

original: yul 'joms pa'i rdo rje spyi bor rnam par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yul 'joms pa'i rdo rje spyi bor rnam par blta bar bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the vajra that conquers the object at the crown.

original: de nas de'i rjes la dngos dang dngos ma yin pa'i tshogs bsag pa'i rten spyan drangs te /
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la dngos dang dngos ma yin pa'i tshogs bsag pa'i rten spyan drangs te /

original: tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag par byas la bdag nyid kyis rdo rje rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i lta stangs kyis blta ste /

original: dbang dang rgyas pa'i gzugs kyis langs la h'um h'um zhes rab tu khros pa'i sems kyis sdang bar bltas la /

original: bdag nyid kyi lus la mi 'jig cing sra ba'i gos gyon la rdo rje'i lus kyi rnam par 'dug pa la lan bdun nam bcu gcig byas na lus la ye shes @45a * //

original: kyi chu rgyun gyis bkrus na longs spyod rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mnyam zhing tshe nyi zla ji ltar yod pa bzhin du gnas pa dang / sa bla'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la dbang ba dang / las dang 'joms pa dang /
analyzed: kyi chu rgyun gyis bkrus na longs spyod rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mnyam zhing tshe nyi zla ji ltar yod pa bzhin du gnas pa dang / sa bla'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la dbang ba dang / las dang 'joms pa dang /
translated: If one bathes in a river, one will become equal to ≈öakra in the enjoyment of wealth, and one will live as long as the sun and moon. One will have dominion over all the worlds up to the heaven of the Pure Abodes, and one will be able to destroy and subdue all the activities of the gods and demons.

original: bsgrags pa dang nges par spyod par 'grub pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / 'dab chags rnams kyi stobs kyi rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i gzugs dang / dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi chogs rnams kyi rje bo dang /

original: de nas de'i las rnams bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis nges par sra ba'i don bsgrub pa ni rgyud kyi tshig nges par bsgrub pa'o //
